```{r}
ClosePrice <- Cl(`CVX`) #Edit here
rm(CVX)
```

#Select only price will predict | y = date of Actual price
```{r}
y <- (c())
Actual_price <- ClosePrice[x]
y <- (index(Actual_price))
y <- as.factor(y) #convert dataType to factor

rm(ClosePrice)
```
--------------- Get Stock Price ---------------


############## Manage Actual dataType and Create Actual DataFrame ##############
#Change Actual_price dataType to matrix.
```{r}
#Now DataType of "Actual_price" is 'xts'.
#We will change dataType to matrix.
#For we can get PriceValue in this valiable.

Actual_price_Matrix <- as.matrix(Actual_price)

#----------------------------------- 
#Loop for crate actual price list  -
#----------------------------------- 
ii <- 1
yy <-(c())
while (ii <= length(Actual_price_Matrix)) {
  yy <- append(yy, Actual_price_Matrix[ii])
  ii <- ii +1
}

actualDataFrame = data.frame(day=y, actualPrice=yy) #Create actualDataFrame

rm(ii)
rm(Actual_price)
rm(Actual_price_Matrix)

```
--------------- Manage Actual dataType and Create Actual DataFrame ---------------


############## Merge predictDataFrame and actualPriceDataFrame ##############
# Merge predicDataFrame and ClosePrice
```{r}
total = merge(predictDataFrame, actualDataFrame, by="day")
rm(predictDataFrame, actualDataFrame)
```
--------------- Merge predictDataFrame and actualPriceDataFrame ---------------


############## Create Actual result and merge to total DataFrame ##############
```{r}
Actual <- (c("Nan")) #Actual is result of price[i] - price[i-1].
price <- total[,3] #Get price data from total DataFrame col3.

i <- 2 #Start at row2.

while(i <= length(price)) {
   n = price[i] - price[i-1]
  
  if(n > 0) {
    Actual = append(Actual, "moving up")
  } else if(n < 0) {
    Actual = append(Actual, "moving down")
  } else {
    Actual = append(Actual, "unchanged")
  }
  i <- i + 1
}

ActualPredict_DataFrame = data.frame(day=y,Actual = Actual) # Create Actual DataFrame
total = merge(total, ActualPredict_DataFrame, by="day") # merge Actual to main DataFrame (total)

```
--------------- Create Actual result and merge to total DataFrame ---------------


############## Check predict result (Set Confusion_Matrix) and merge to total ##############
```{r}
i <- 2
Confusion_Matrix <- (c('Nan'))
while(i <= length(total[,1])) {
  if(total[,2][i] == "moving up") {
    if(total[,4][i] == "moving up") {
      Confusion_Matrix = append(Confusion_Matrix, "TP")
    } else {
      Confusion_Matrix = append(Confusion_Matrix, "FP")
    }
  } else if(total[,2][i] == "moving down") {
    if(total[,4][i] == "moving up") {
      Confusion_Matrix = append(Confusion_Matrix, "FN")
    } else {
      Confusion_Matrix = append(Confusion_Matrix, "TN")
    }
  } else if(total[,2][i] == "unchanged") {
    Confusion_Matrix = append(Confusion_Matrix, "-")
  }
  
  i <- i + 1
}
ConfusionDataFrame = data.frame(day=y, Confusion_Matrix=Confusion_Matrix)
total = merge(total, ConfusionDataFrame, by="day")
rm(i)
```
```{r}
rm(i)
```

--------------- Check predict result (Set Confusion_Matrix) and merge to total ---------------

############## Sum of "TP", "FP", "FN", "TN", "-" ##############
```{r}
a <- table(total[,5])
TP <- a[names(a)=="TP"]
FP <- a[names(a)=="FP"]
FN <- a[names(a)=="FN"]
TN <- a[names(a)=="TN"]
Na <- a[names(a)=="Nan"]
n <- a[names(a)=="-"]
Total_Data = TP + FP + FN + TN + Na + n

Correctly_Classified = TP + TN
Incorrectly_Classified = FP + FN

#True Positive Rate
TPR_Yes <- TP/(TP+FN)
TPR_No <- TN/(FP+TN)

#False Positive Rate
FPR_Yes <- FP/(FP+TN)
FPR_No <- FN/(TP+FN)

#Precision: Positive Value (PPV)
PPV_Yes <- TP/(TP+TN)
PPV_No <- TN/(TN+FN)

#Recall
Recall_Yes <- TP/(TP+FN)
Recall_No <- TN/(TN+FP)

#Accuracy
Accuracy <- (TP + TN) / (TP + TN + FP +FN)

#F-Measure
F.Measure_Yes <- (2*PPV_Yes * Recall_Yes) / (PPV_Yes + Recall_Yes)
F.Measure_No <- (2*PPV_No * Recall_No) / (PPV_No + Recall_No)

result = data.frame(Total_Data = Total_Data, TP=TP, FP=FP, FN=FN , TN=TN , Nan=Na , unchanged =n, Correctly_Classified=Correctly_Classified, Incorrectly_Classified=Incorrectly_Classified, TPR_Yes = TPR_Yes, TPR_No = TPR_No, FPR_Yes = FPR_Yes, FPR_No=FPR_No, PPV_Yes= PPV_Yes, PPV_No=PPV_No, Recall_Yes=Recall_Yes, Recall_No= Recall_No, Accuracy=Accuracy,F.Measure_Yes= F.Measure_Yes, F.Measure_No=F.Measure_No)

m_data <- (c(Total_Data, 
TP, 
FP, 
FN , 
TN , 
Na, 
n, 
Correctly_Classified, 
Incorrectly_Classified, 
TPR_Yes, 
TPR_No , 
FPR_Yes, 
FPR_No, 
PPV_Yes, 
PPV_No, 
Recall_Yes, 
Recall_No, 
Accuracy,
F.Measure_Yes, 
F.Measure_No))

setCol <- c('Value')
setRow<-c('Total_Data', 'TP', 'FP', 'FN', 'TN', 'Nan', 'unchanged', 'Correctly_Classified', 'Incorrectly_Classified', 'TPR_Yes', 'TPR_No', 'FPR_Yes', 'FPR_No', 'PPV_Yes', 'PPV_No', 'Recall_Yes', 'Recall_No', 'Accuracy', 'F.Measure_Yes', 'F.Measure_No'
)

result1<- matrix(m_data, nrow = length(m_data), ncol = , byrow = FALSE, dimnames = list(setRow, setCol))
```

```{r}
write.xlsx(total, file=fileName, sheetName="Data", col.names=TRUE, row.names=TRUE, append=FALSE)
write.xlsx(result1, file=fileName, sheetName="Result", col.names=TRUE, row.names=TRUE, append=TRUE)
```
